languages.text: "Слышала, ты гадаешь на Таро... Тебя после этого не мучают кошмары? Не являются голоса?"
"So, I hear you use the Tarot to divine the future... Do you have nightmares afterward? Problems sleeping? Voices haunting you?"
languages.original_text: "Слышала, ты гадаешь на Таро... Тебя после этого не мучают кошмары? Не являются голоса?"

traits.locale_text: "So I've heard you use the Tarot to divine... Do you get nightmares after? Sleep problems? Voices haunting you?"
"So I've heard you use the Tarot to divine... Do you get nightmares after? Sleep problems? Voices haunting you?"
"So, I hear you use the Tarot to divine... Do you get nightmares afterwards? Sleep problems? Voices haunting you?"
"So, I hear you use the Tarot to divine... Do you get nightmares afterwards? Sleep problems? Voices haunting you?"
"So, I hear you use the Tarot to divine the future... Do you have nightmares afterward? Problems sleeping? Voices haunting you?"
"So, I hear you use the Tarot to divine the future... Do you have nightmares afterward? Problems sleeping? Voices haunting you?"
"So, I hear you use the Tarot to divine the future... Do you have nightmares afterward? Problems sleeping? Voices haunting you?"

languages.text: "Wie ich höre, sagt Ihr mit Hilfe des Tarots die Zukunft voraus ... Habt Ihr danach Albträume? Schwierigkeiten zu schlafen? Suchen Euch Stimmen ein?"
languages.original_text: "So, I hear you use the Tarot to divine the future... Do you have nightmares afterward? Problems sleeping? Voices haunting you?"

traits.locale_text: "Wie ich höre, sagt Ihr mit Hilfe des Tarots die Zukunft voraus ... Habt Ihr danach Albträume? Schwierigkeiten zu schlafen? Suchen Euch Stimmen ein?"

languages.text: « Or donc, vous vous servez du tarot pour prédire l'avenir... Ça vous arrive de faire des cauchemars, après coup ? De souffrir d'insomnies et d'entendre des voix qui reviennent vous hanter ? »
languages.original_text: "So, I hear you use the Tarot to divine the future... Do you have nightmares afterward? Problems sleeping? Voices haunting you?"

traits.locale_text: « Or donc, vous vous servez du tarot pour prédire l'avenir... Ça vous arrive de faire des cauchemars, après coup ? De souffrir d'insomnies et d'entendre des voix qui reviennent vous hanter ? »

languages.text: «He oído que usa el Tarot para adivinar el futuro... ¿Eso no le provoca pesadillas? ¿Problemas para dormir? ¿Voces que la atormentan?».
languages.original_text: "So, I hear you use the Tarot to divine the future... Do you have nightmares afterward? Problems sleeping? Voices haunting you?"

traits.locale_text: «He oído que usa el Tarot para adivinar el futuro... ¿Eso no le provoca pesadillas? ¿Problemas para dormir? ¿Voces que la atormentan?».

languages.text: 「タロットで未来を占っていると聞いたけど…その後、悪夢を見たり、眠れなかったり、声に悩まされたりした？」
languages.original_text: "So, I hear you use the Tarot to divine the future... Do you have nightmares afterward? Problems sleeping? Voices haunting you?"

traits.locale_text: 「タロットで未来を占っていると聞いたけど…その後、悪夢を見たり、眠れなかったり、声に悩まされたりした？」

languages.text: “你看，我听说你会用塔罗牌来占卜未来……占卜之后，你会不会做噩梦？会不会遇到睡眠问题？会不会听到周围有什么声音？”
languages.original_text: "So, I hear you use the Tarot to divine the future... Do you have nightmares afterward? Problems sleeping? Voices haunting you?"

traits.locale_text: “你看，我听说你会用塔罗牌来占卜未来……占卜之后，你会不会做噩梦？会不会遇到睡眠问题？会不会听到周围有什么声音？”

languages.original_text: "So, I hear you use the Tarot to divine the future... Do you have nightmares afterward? Problems sleeping? Voices haunting you?"

languages.text: "Duyduğuma göre geleceğe dair kehanetler için Tarot'tan faydalanıyormuşsun... Ardından kâbus da görüyor musun? Uykunda sorun yaşıyor musun? Sesler musallat oluyor mu?"
languages.original_text: "So, I hear you use the Tarot to divine the future... Do you have nightmares afterward? Problems sleeping? Voices haunting you?"
